titleStmt.title: England's vvorthies. Select lives of the most eminent persons from Constantine the Great, to the death of Oliver Cromwel late Protector. / By William Winstanley, Gent.
titleStmt.author: Winstanley, William, 1628?-1698.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Nath. Brooke, at the sign of the Angel in Cornhill,

notesStmt.note: With an additional title page, engraved with 47 small portraits.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Febr. 1659"; the 60 in the imprint date has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the sign of the Angel in Cornhill
